016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.benchmarks.reactivestreams;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.builder.ConfigurationBuilder;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.core.Xorcery;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.metadata.Metadata;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.WithMetadata;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ClientConfiguration;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.client.ReactiveStreamsClient;
025import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.server.ReactiveStreamsServer;
026import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.server.ReactiveStreamsServerConfiguration;
027import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
028import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
029import org.openjdk.jmh.annotations.*;
030import org.openjdk.jmh.runner.Runner;
031import org.openjdk.jmh.runner.options.OptionsBuilder;
032import org.reactivestreams.Publisher;
033import org.reactivestreams.Subscriber;
034import org.reactivestreams.Subscription;
035
036import java.util.concurrent.*;
037
038@State(Scope.Benchmark)
039@Fork(value = 1, warmups = 1, jvmArgs = "-Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote=true")
040@Warmup(iterations = 1)
041@Measurement(iterations = 3)
042public class PublishSubscriberBenchmarks {
043
044    private static final String config = """
045            secrets.enabled: true
046            keystores.enabled: true
047            dns.client.enabled: true
048                        
049            jetty.client.enabled: true
050            jetty.client.ssl.enabled: true
051            reactivestreams.client.enabled: true
052
053            metrics.enabled: false
054            metrics.filter:
055                - xorcery:*
056            metrics.subscriber.authority: localhost:443    
057            """;
058
059    private static final String clientConfig = """
060            instance.id: client
061            """;
062
063    private static final String serverConfig = """
064            instance.id: server
065            jetty.server.enabled: true
066            jetty.server.ssl.enabled: true
067            jetty.server.ssl.port: 8443
068            reactivestreams.server.enabled: true
069            """;
070
071    private ClientPublisher clientPublisher;
072    private CompletableFuture<Void> stream;
073
074    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
075
076        new Runner(new OptionsBuilder()
077                .include(PublishSubscriberBenchmarks.class.getSimpleName() + ".*")
078                .forks(0)
079                .jvmArgs("-Dcom.sun.management.jmxremote=true")
080                .build()).run();
081    }
082
083    private Xorcery server;
084    private Xorcery client;
085
086    @Setup()
087    public void setup() throws Exception {
088
089        Configuration serverConf = new ConfigurationBuilder().addTestDefaults().addYaml(config).addYaml(serverConfig).build();
090        System.out.println(serverConf);
091        server = new Xorcery(serverConf);
092        ReactiveStreamsServer reactiveStreams = server.getServiceLocator().getService(ReactiveStreamsServer.class);
093        Logger logger = LogManager.getLogger(getClass());
094
095        // Server subscriber
096        ServerSubscriber<WithMetadata<String>> serverSubscriber = new ServerSubscriber<>() {
097
098            int i = 0;
099
100            @Override
101            public void onNext(WithMetadata<String> item) {
102                i++;
103                subscription.request(1);
104            }
105        };
106
107        reactiveStreams.subscriber("serversubscriber", cfg -> serverSubscriber, (Class<? extends Subscriber<?>>) serverSubscriber.getClass());
108
109        // Client publisher
110        Configuration configuration = new ConfigurationBuilder().addTestDefaults().addYaml(config).addYaml(clientConfig).build();
111        client = new Xorcery(configuration);
112        clientPublisher = new ClientPublisher();
113
114        ReactiveStreamsClient reactiveStreamsClient = client.getServiceLocator().getService(ReactiveStreamsClient.class);
115        stream = reactiveStreamsClient.publish(ReactiveStreamsServerConfiguration.get(configuration).getURI(), "serversubscriber",
116                Configuration::empty, clientPublisher, (Class<? extends Publisher<?>>) clientPublisher.getClass(), ClientConfiguration.defaults());
117
118        logger.info("Setup done");
119    }
120
121    @TearDown
122    public void teardown() throws Exception {
123        stream.complete(null);
124//        clientPublisher.getDone().get();
125        client.close();
126        server.close();
127        LogManager.getLogger().info("Teardown done");
128    }
129
130    @Benchmark
131    @BenchmarkMode(Mode.Throughput)
132    public void writes() throws ExecutionException, InterruptedException, TimeoutException {
133        clientPublisher.publish(new WithMetadata<>(new Metadata.Builder()
134                .add("foo", "bar")
135                .build(), System.currentTimeMillis() + ""));
136    }
137
138    public static abstract class ServerSubscriber<T>
139            implements Subscriber<T> {
140
141        protected Subscription subscription;
142
143        @Override
144        public void onSubscribe(Subscription subscription) {
145            this.subscription = subscription;
146            subscription.request(8192);
147        }
148
149        @Override
150        public void onError(Throwable throwable) {
151
152        }
153
154        @Override
155        public void onComplete() {
156
157        }
158    }
159
160    public static class ClientPublisher
161            implements Publisher<WithMetadata<String>> {
162
163        private final CompletableFuture<Void> done = new CompletableFuture<>();
164        private final Semaphore semaphore = new Semaphore(0);
165        private Subscriber<? super WithMetadata<String>> subscriber;
166
167        public void publish(WithMetadata<String> item) throws InterruptedException {
168            if (!semaphore.tryAcquire(5, TimeUnit.SECONDS)) {
169                // Try again
170                publish(item);
171            }
172            subscriber.onNext(item);
173        }
174
175        public CompletableFuture<Void> getDone() {
176            return done;
177        }
178
179        @Override
180        public void subscribe(Subscriber<? super WithMetadata<String>> subscriber) {
181            this.subscriber = subscriber;
182            subscriber.onSubscribe(new Subscription() {
183                @Override
184                public void request(long n) {
185                    semaphore.release((int) n);
186//                    LogManager.getLogger().warn("Current requests:" + semaphore.availablePermits());
187                }
188
189                @Override
190                public void cancel() {
191                    done.complete(null);
192                }
193            });
194        }
195    }
196}
